function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in tax revenues due to limited consumer investment and economic activity","Impact":"Inability to fund transportation projects and meet financial obligations","Mitigation":"Diversification of revenue sources, cost-cutting measures, and seeking federal support","Technologies":"Financial forecasting and modeling tools, revenue management software, and budget allocation systems","People":"State and local governments, transportation agencies","Owner":"State and local governments, transportation agencies"},{"Description":"Struggle to attract riders back onto public conveyances due to pandemic concerns","Impact":"Continued financial challenges and operational losses for transportation agencies","Mitigation":"Enhanced cleaning and sanitation measures, promotion of safety guidelines, and investment in contactless payment systems","Technologies":"Advanced cleaning equipment, contactless payment technology, and real-time passenger information systems","People":"Public transportation users, transportation agencies","Owner":"Transportation agencies, local governments, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"30% decline in CP revenue projected nationwide","Impact":"Financial strain on transportation agencies and limited resources for operations and maintenance","Mitigation":"Financial planning, budget reallocation, and seeking alternative revenue streams","Technologies":"Financial management software, budgeting tools, and revenue tracking systems","People":"Transportation agencies, state governments","Owner":"Transportation agencies, financial departments"}]}
